author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Curtiss-Wright To Utilize $50 Mln In Repatriated Foreign Cash To Expand 2018 Share Repurchase Program
text:
May 21 (Reuters) - Curtiss-Wright Corp:
* CURTISS-WRIGHT TO UTILIZE $50 MILLION IN REPATRIATED FOREIGN CASH TO EXPAND 2018 SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM
* CURTISS-WRIGHT - THE ADDITIONAL REPURCHASE ACTIVITY WILL BE CONDUCTED CONCURRENTLY WITH COâ€™S ONGOING $50 MILLION SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM FOR 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
